name: Swords & Bones 4
storyline: In Swords & Bones 4, you'll step into the shoes of Ingrid, an apprentice mage tasked with freeing her sister Shaivi from the Shadow Demon. A series of new traps and enemies will test your skills. With the aid of new power-ups and abilities, Swords & Bones 4 presents you with a fresh epic challenge to tackle.
summary: The fourth installment of Swords & Bones immerses you in a new fantasy adventure, with pixel art in a side-scrolling action-platformer style. In this latest chapter, harness the power of magic to emerge victorious!
